website_summaries.verdict: LED headlights at an affordable price with brighter illumination than most.
pros: Bright 8,000 lumens offers extra illumination at night or in bad weather conditions
Simple plug and cord make installation quick and easy for most cars
cons: Light shines with a slight blue hue in some lamps

customer_reviews.title: These are the real deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my 1st set of LED headlights - coming from 10+ years of using HID lights across multiple vehicles. I am impressed - instant on, great color temperature and very easy to install. These are the real deal, easily as bright or brighter than any 35watt HID kit that I have ever used before. Put these on my 15' Jetta - what a difference, changed the whole look of the car AND increased night time visibility 10 fold over the stock halogen. Very satisfied - I even bought a second set for my fogs - I am not going back to HID, LED is here to stay. Hats off to Auxbeam for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chabalik

customer_reviews.title: Less than year and already bad.
customer_reviews.text: updated review 1/14/18 - Customer service is great, AUXBEAM stands behind there product and insure your 100% satisfied. They reached out to me to see how they can help and sent me a new set of light. This was all within the 1 year warranty. They follow to make sure i received the light and if install when well. I will definitely buy from them again. 12-16-17. 5 days from one year of install date. The light started to flicker while driving. After restarting the car the passenger side was the only one flickering.
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: New bulbd for my 19 4Runner  UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these for my new 4 Runner, I love the way they look, the brightness is perfect. The do run hot, a lot hotter than the stock bulbs so I am a little nervous about them getting too hot and starting a fire but so far the fan seems to work a little but man these things heat up. I bought these and the high beams 5009's. Like I've said so far so good. UPDATED So one of my headlights just stopped working. They aren't even a year old. They are bright but they don't seem to last long. I now spent 30 bucks for a set of bulbs to only have 1 work.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Auxbeam Headlights
customer_reviews.text: I bought the H11 and H4 headlight kit and after installing i found these to be rather bright, lol like blinding bright. So it would be a good idea to re-adjust the headlight after installation. Anyways the build quality is consistent on both the H11 and H4 and is a simply plug and play. Also to note that the H11 has a label on the connector which says ' + ' and ' - '. (i always thought H11 could have been plugged in any orientation, hmm.) Also to note, the fan located at the base of the bulbs isn't loud at all I hope to get a long life out of these :). I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dayne

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last more than a year before one of them failed
customer_reviews.text: Regular halogen headlamps last several years before they fail, even in rough environments. These expensive LED lamps only lasted about 11 months before one of them failed, used only in a warm climate on decent roads. Considering the initial cost, I would not recommend them. They're really bright, and the color is easy to get used to, but they cost too much to be replacing on an annual basis. So now, in order to have two headlights that look the same, I need to replace them both.
customer_reviews.author: Gunner

customer_reviews.title: Don't work in Arizona
customer_reviews.text: I installed these a week ago in my 2015 Chevrolet Equinox they are very bright however they started turning on and off randomly I believe this is due to heat I live in Arizona and on this particular night it was 102 degrees out this is unsafe to have your lights turning on and off so I have to return them however what I can say is shortly after purchasing I was contacted by a representative from the company asking me how everything was going and at that time everything was going great and I was very happy to hear from them I've never had that happen before from any manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: branden w

customer_reviews.title: Flickers and dies less than a year of use
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first but didn’t last a year. Manufacturer says there’s a warranty but asks for an arm and a leg so “they can send it to their development team”. The proof is a picture of my car without headlights. Shady company.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Verify they work before you put everything together
customer_reviews.text: Light output is definitely brighter than the original halogen H11 bulbs. My biggest issues are the size of the cooling fan does not allow the cover on the back of the light housing to be reinstalled correctly to keep moisture out of the light housing and that the plugs need to be zip tied to the factory wiring to keep them attached. The plug is not "keyed" so it is possible to hook these up backwards and have them not work at all. Led lights are polarity sensitive and that's not indicated at all on the plug or packaging.
customer_reviews.author: wheeling365

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, inexpensive, and work, didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in my 2015 Ford Transit Connect work van. I use this van M-F and sometimes take it on trips mountain biking or hauling motorcycles. They were great till one week ago the passenger side started dying. I run my lights always when the van is running so they get used a lot. However at 14 months old they need to be replaced which is a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Saiger

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: These looked great on paper, the beam blinded other drivers and one of them failed on me within the first week. Poor quality, not recommended. Do your research, there are video reviews on LED options out there, and AUXBEAM isn't something I'd consider putting in my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Spanky

customer_reviews.title: Very bright but too much static on my radio
customer_reviews.text: I really do want to like these lights but there is one major issue. When on, they wipe out about 80% of my FM radio stations. There is some kind of interference coming off the fans in these things which causes major static on my stereo. Other reviews have mentioned the same problem. I decided to buy them anyway and take my chances. I cannot speak for the longevity of these as I've only had them installed for a month or so. However when they go out, I will not be purchasing them again. Unless anyone knows of a fix for this issue?
customer_reviews.author: J805

customer_reviews.title: Longevity not to good.
customer_reviews.text: My first set of ox beams were wonderful and lasted just over a year got about 13 months worth. With the second set, one is still quite good but the other died a week ago making it 6 months. I really like the brightness and price but I don't want to be replacing bulbs that don't seem to last a full year and this time only 6 months on one of them. I hope they are as good as their word on replacements.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blish

customer_reviews.title: Improvement far beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: These light have been such a major improvement in my 2013 Nissan Altima. The lights that were originally in it for the low beams didn't even appear to be working while driving down lighted roads in town and cast light such a short direction in darker areas that the high beams were almost required. These lights cast out beautifully and illuminate the road in all the conditions that previously I could not see at all. When the time comes to replace the lights in my other vehicles I intend on upgrading to these types of bulbs as well.
customer_reviews.author: parthos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a bargain at $30/pair. The left and right lights are interchangeable. Depending on your headlight housing and lens, you may need to place the LED's up/down or side/side. The LED plug does not have the inner groove guide like the OEM halogen lights. So you do need to experiment as to which is the positive or negative orientation. Test the lights before placing into the headlight housing. Longevity is still in question.
customer_reviews.author: paititi

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: Lights were ok, kinda pricey but i figured youd get what you paid for, first set of lights lasted me about 6 months then they sent me a replacement set that only lasted me about a week, they make you go through a bunch of process’s (including cutting the wire and sending them a picture of it) before theyll even send you a replacement so they basically leave you without a vehicle for a week. Customer service is decent but 100% needs some work.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepman425

customer_reviews.title: Great for a short period of time
customer_reviews.text: Lights were purchased on Oct. 22 and as of April 8, the passenger light is pulsating and flickering going down the road. I switched the lights to see if it was the wiring but does the same on the drivers side now. I had the f16 series for two years and they were perfect but was in a bind and went cheaper for these. There is a warranty but many have said it is not worth it to mess with it. All in all I'm sure these lights are good especially for the price but my pair is faulty. Wouldnt hesitate to buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jordan H

customer_reviews.title: Second set of low beams same problem!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these LED bulbs January 20,2019. Nine (9) months later October 22,2019 both low beams went out a day apart. Didn't even get a year of use out of them. I will say they are the brightest I've found. Forgot to mention this is my second low beam set and the first lasted about the same amount of time. The high beam bulbs that I purchased with the first set are still going strong over a year later. How do you make a warranty claim? I'm not going to keep wasting money when they have a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Walters

customer_reviews.title: They look great
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set almost a year ago. I tested them on my bench for 24 hours, then they sat in my garage all this time. I just put them in place of my reflector high beams last week. They look great, and installed easily. The only catch is the power connector. It could be better. I image they will could come loose on a really bumpy road. I will zip tie them later.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade over Halogen
customer_reviews.text: I drive a 2012 Ford Focus, I had a burnt out light and the halogen bulbs I use are $50 to replace them so I made a smarter investment. I bought these, and keep in mind specifically for the 2012 Focus, you will need the error free wire adapters to go with these to work, otherwise you get a bulb fault error and they wont work if the car is on. The wires ended up bringing my cost to $50, which is the same as my halogens, except these are brighter and I know will way outlast my old ones. I plan on upgrading my high beams and fogs/break/turn signal/hazards, etc to LED soon as they are simply way better.
customer_reviews.author: codysmith_81

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk!  Do not buy, no support
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in April. I bought these headlight bulbs in both dim and brights (H-11 & 9005) and 9006 fog lights for my Toyota 4Runner, and already the dims and fogs are flickering and going out. I emailed Auxbeam and they gave me an email address for the seller of Auxbeam on Amazon. They refunded me my money for the bulbs. they are pretty bright and have that bright white cool light. They’re pretty good while they last. I’m currently trying to get my fog lights warranteed right now. It’s been a hassle and haven’t really gotten anywhere after a week of emailing Auxbeam and the seller directly. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: christian williams

customer_reviews.title: Much brighter
customer_reviews.text: Read a lot reviews before buying an led headlight. I am glad I bought these, it looks really good. It is definitely brighter than the halogen lights. One thing wasn’t so clear, partly may be because I did not read the instructions before installing is that the plus minus has to be facing down or else the power won’t go to the lights. Once I switched it, it worked fine. So far so good after several days and night use.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good for Tacoma but not 4Runner.
customer_reviews.text: Because of heat sink, these wouldn't fit in 2012 4Runner without removing headlight housing. I therefore installed these easily in 2016 Tacoma and swapped it's standard OSRAM H11 bulbs into the 4Runner. Brighter and whiter than standard bulbs as expected from 8000lm and 6000k color temp specs. The fans are quite loud but who hears them with engine running and the price is much lower than the Opt7 LED I have in motorcycle. If these last 2 years I'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Racqueteer9

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright white. They don’t overcast into the other lanes. Easy to install Edit: they do have a blue hue to them. They are not bright white. 2010 Impreza wrx
customer_reviews.author: Drake Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: 2007 Saturn Sky Redline
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old set of HID's that were put on from a previous owner and these are a definite improvement. They are plug and play for the Saturn Sky. The protective caps do not screw back as these stick out more than the stock bulbs but these are supposed to be weatherproof. I cant speak for long term use or how it compares to the stock bulb but I am happy with how it looks on the SKY. It is a definite upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Jose I Lopez

customer_reviews.title: VERY BRIGHT LED, by a BRAND that has never let me down
customer_reviews.text: This is a very, very bright bulb that works well in my fog light housing. I have a Subaru wrx 2015 limited LED headlights and these are much more brighter than those. It makes me want to run them on all the time. I like to run these on all the time because they are so beautiful and bright. it fills in the ground very nicely. I was considering hids, but i'm glad i went for this setup instead. Check out my video below and picture. If you guys are on the fence, don't be, get it!
customer_reviews.author: John N

customer_reviews.title: 2017 Honda Civic Si
customer_reviews.text: Lights are pretty white! Have yet to try it in complete darkness yet but will update. They fit pretty snug in a Honda Civic. No loose parts, no moving bulb. Will update rating in regards to brightness at night once I test it. Update: brightness is fine. It’s no upgrade in regards to brightness but everything IS whiter. The cutoff in projector housings might be why it’s not as bright but it’s still visible. But it’s an aftermarket bulb so I don’t have high expectations, and it’s $30. You get what you paid for!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1 year or less.
customer_reviews.text: I has this in my motorcycle and it worked pretty well for the year that the warranty covers. Which really died 2 days after the year warrenty was up. So unless you want to buy new light bulbs every year I wouldn't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Headlight bulbs arrived very quickly along with my fog lights. Nice packaging as well. Went together with ease and my goodness what a difference. I had the $40 pair of sylvania bulbs which I thought were great but it’s a night and day difference. Driving 12 hours to work across three states at night I had about 10-12 other drivers shine their brights at me so I’ll have to do some adjusting but other than that they are a great led bulb, especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dannytown19

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for about 1 Year.
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second set for the low beams in my 2013 Ram 1500. They were relatively easy to install (snug fit in the housing for the low beam, but did fit), and I was happy with the brightness. Unfortunately, I haven't been able to get them to last for much over a year. The fans are also quite loud and they seem to run hot (especially if you also have Photos illustrate the 'normal' LED module vs the 'damaged' LED module that flickers.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Becker

customer_reviews.title: Failed inspection
customer_reviews.text: Not saying anything... Bought the bulbs last march. Got inspection last May. Passed. This year, Inspector failed because 'blah blah DOT approved LED bulb" still love the output. I threw another pair on my foglights and now when it rains.. i can still see paint stripes in the road.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic; died after 9months
customer_reviews.text: update 7/1/19 Installed these in November 2018, July 1st 2019 - 1 of 2 headlights died and my car requires removal of the bumper to change the headlights so this blows.. Fortunately the passengerside headlight is still very bright so at least I can still see. Swapped my stock halogen for these in my 08cts, can see much more. Projects a bright white light, excellent deal. Hope they last since i had to remove the bumper to get them in!
customer_reviews.author: Kini

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and even beam pattern. Issues wear gloves because they will mess up your fingers cut mine up pretty decent the find are razor shard. The small blue Delrin piece is too large for it to screw in properly so you’ll have to swap out the little delrin from the light you are replacing
customer_reviews.author: Robert Monterroso

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are amazing so far. I put them on my 2011 accord fog lights and already had them on my headlight. Where i live there are a lot of deer and little lights. These light up the road wayyyy better than stock halogen. I did have to point the headlight downward bc i was getting flashed for blinding other drivers. Since adjusting the beam they have been amazing. Would def recommend. It has only been 2 days but far so good. Got tired of the hid ballast always going out. Hopefully these last longer.
customer_reviews.author: JC Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: These lights were ok to begin with. Brighter than the halogen bulbs, cheaper, and easy to install. However, around the 1 year mark, we started noticing it was difficult to drive at night in our car with these. We thought maybe the lenses were just old and fading. However, after the two year mark, it became so dim it was unsafe to drive. I took the bulbs out and half the diodes were not working or producing light at all. For an LED to fail after only 2 years 1000 hours max, they have to be made pretty shoddily. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pepsis Formosa

customer_reviews.title: 2017 Toyota Tacoma
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal lights for my truck. I was skeptical but damn was I wrong. Seriously have people asked me if these were HIDs. Best bank for your hard earned bucks. Honestly for $26 these are a complete steal.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: started to flicker after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these only a month or two and ALREADY have began flickering. The right lowbeam did first now the left driver low beam is now doing it. Update: so after my last review a representative from auxbeam reached out to me and apologized for the inconvenience that these lights caused. The customer service is top notch. That's un heard of these days. Which is why I gave it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, much brighter than stock, and the pic shows BOTH lights on, passenger side is stock, from the inside, it looks like there isn't even a light on the passenger side, kinda sad how dim they are. Now I can much more safely drive at night with my big rig! Hopefully these live a long time, because I've read that the fans go out after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Mazduhz

customer_reviews.title: huge different
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a used minivan during the day but discovered that night that the low beam headlights were very dim and made it difficult to see the road. I researched this issue and found it talked about a lot on the web. I read recommendation to replace the halogen bulbs with LED. I watched YouTube videos demonstrating them so I purchased a set. WOW what a different. They are much brighter and whiter which illuminate the lines on the road much better. My only issue with them is they are a bit wabbly in the socket.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Just installed these in my 2006 4runner and it looks great. Fires right up. The only problem I had with these is the small screw broke off while I was twisting the light in but I was able to make it work. I also ended up swapping the rubber bushing from my old bulb as the the ones that come on these were to thick to click into. Will update after a few miles of driving. Quality doesn't seem that great but it's pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Harith Jayaweera

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied with these lights!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never write a review but after I installed these on my pontiac G6 I was very happy I purchased these and thought I would let everyone know that these lights are extremely bright and look awesome for the price you pay. What I paid for these loghts is what I would have paid at the auto store for regular dull yellow bulbs. I can honestly tell everyone that you will not regret buying these not to mention how easy the installation was. I will definitely purchase more of these if and when these ever go out...
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Super bright and way better than HID
customer_reviews.text: Super bright and way better than HID. I've used HID for years and what sucks about HID is that they take time to heat up to full temp, you have to mount a damn ballast somewhere. These literally just plug and play, no extra time needed for the leds to get to full temp, no stupid ballast, and they are super bright. Do yourself a favour and get these, they're cheaper than HID's and way better. also, Auxbeam has a great warranty, I bought 3 of them so far for each of my cars.
customer_reviews.author: Min Han

customer_reviews.title: SEARCH NO MORE!
customer_reviews.text: HOLY MOLLY COW! Plasma LED is the way to go!!! Lit them before installing and wow super blinding, after install, OPT7 has a perfect line of sight without blinding on-coming traffic. I have bought 2 lights from them, the other H11 Fluxbeam which are really nice. F-S2 are in the fog light area and you do not hear neither fan operating. I have a 2016 Altima SR. I have vigorously scoured the internet for the best, price+quality+longevity, and OPT7 has earned my business. SEARCH NO MORE! I was not payed or awarded nothing for this awesome review.
customer_reviews.author: IvanJR MR. Review

customer_reviews.title: Bright light! loud fans...
customer_reviews.text: love the look and quality of these lights. they are a true upgrade from the OEM halogens. the light output is great and installation is easy. I will say that the fans are a bit loud but only noticeable when sitting in traffic or parked in a parking lot. in the attached picture I have the LEDs in the fog light housing and the OEM halogens in the headlight housing.
customer_reviews.author: NapTime Davie

customer_reviews.title: Easiest upgrade ever. Bright clean light for less!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am totally thrilled! Bright and crisp light. As for longevity, time will tell. At this great price, less then $30, I will be happy if they last a year. Anything longer is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: TechAaronLoyd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome lights! Super white light, very bright and easy to install! I bought 4, 2 for low beam and 2 for high beam! They definitely feel like high quality and have a built in fan that seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Look great once on in wife’s Accord. The o ring is way too big though. Easy fix just put on the one from the old lights but I don’t see why they made it so thick. Work well in halogen projectors with decent light pattern. Blue O ring is the auxbeam
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Price

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd set of these i bought, all for different vehicles. they were bright and worked great, only just this week on has gone out. LEDs flickering and putting out no light. The others are still going strong so definitely not the norm. i would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Will R

customer_reviews.title: very bright
customer_reviews.text: item as described by the seller, not too difficult to install, depending on the make and model of your vehicle it could be easy or hard, please be aware this headlights are very bright refocus the light beam pattern so you wont blind oncoming drivers
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Avoid: LED fans will fail in short time
customer_reviews.text: My Auxbeam are dead in 2 years due to heat sink fan failures. The rated lifespan is more than 2 years in the description. Here are the specs: High speed mute fan (12000R/Min). High Air flow for faster cooling rate. IP65 waterproof Liftspan: 30,000 hours Planning to order fanless LEDs to replace failing Auxbeam LEDs that have cooling fans.
customer_reviews.author: Ken L

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Auxbeam in all my personal vehicles, and a fleet of company vehicles. They perform great, super bright at night. I got pulled into the scales, and they let me know my right front headlight was burned out. Ok, things happen, no big deal. I tried calling Auxbeam several times and both phone numbers listed on the website are dis connected. Disappointed that I'm having to pay for another set. I have a defective bulb that is covered for 1 year and these bulbs are about 8 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Betina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These lights are awesome! Installing them on my 2017 Honda Accord was easy and they look great. The light is a nice white with a very slight bit of blue and project onto the road nice and even. The fans are barely noticeable when the car is running and after a few days I don't even notice them anymore. I tried to take pics, but my camera doesn't do them justice. I would definitely recommend this lights!
customer_reviews.author: SS1981

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife!! Happy Life!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. She has a 2018 Honda CR-V, the factory lights were very dim, she was always complaining on how terrible they were.I Put these Led's in now Happy Wife, Happy Life. She loves them, she said she can't believe the difference. So now i am ordering the high beam bulbs and fog light bulbs.Thanks again......
customer_reviews.author: Myles Doucette

customer_reviews.title: Must buy to improve night time visibility
customer_reviews.text: Huge huge upgrade from oem stock halogen headlights. Item fit my car without issues at all. Much brighter and better visibility at night. Can't believe I didn't upgrade sooner.
customer_reviews.author: andrew cheung

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE LIGHTS
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Amazing Lights!! I purchased these for my 2017 Tacoma Sport. I used them in the fog lights and they are AMAZING. The prize is unbeatable for the quality you get out of these. They are a clean crisp white without a blue hue which I love cause I hate the blue hue. Used with AuxBeam F-16 series in the headlights
customer_reviews.author: Brett M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit For 2015 Pathfinder
customer_reviews.text: Installed these in my 2015 Nissan Pathfinder. Others have said they had to turn bulbs around and use zip ties to secure as the clips do not line up, but I did not have that issue. These were a direct fit for the low beam (H11) of my vehicle and super easy to install. Bulbs seem well made and I do not hear the fans inside vehicle as others have stated. Just ordered the 9005s for the high beams.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Update 11/15/19: They’re still shining strong. Bring back the $24 sale. I need some more Update: They’re still going strong after almost 2 years. I’m a night driver so they’re on for long hours. Extremely bright lights with great coverage, but unfortunately the fan is too loud for Hybrid cars. It gets really annoying when you stop the car. I had to return them
customer_reviews.author: MPower-Project

customer_reviews.title: It's best to buy for quality over price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on a first I thought it was a good buy for the price, but you get what you pay for. 5 months since I bought it and my left low beam is flickering and it doesn't stay on like my right one. I thought it might be a computer error on the car like I heard some people had, so I bought an adapter 50 watts error canceler and nothing. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs flickering after 7 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the bulbs for a 2007 4runner and installed them in April/May of 2019. By early December of 2019, I’ve been experiencing flickering in the passenger bulb that is present 80 percent of the time. Light output also seems to have gone down since but difficult to measure/monitor that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: seems like a solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Just got them yesterday installation was easy fit right into the factory plug connector was high quality and seemed plenty durable enough. They work just fine in my factory halogen projector housing light pattern was still clearly defined and much more even spread than the halogens and doesn't shine any higher than they're supposed to. product itself felt high quality and that it should last. i'll revise my review if i have any issues. for now tho i'm loving them.
customer_reviews.author: jeromy dunne

customer_reviews.title: Not buying again, trying the Sealight brand
customer_reviews.text: Passenger side light began flickering one night and when I checked it, one side of the led unit had gone out. So these lights are pretty bright and nice looking, but probably only have a 6 month lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: Jose I. Bernal

customer_reviews.title: Company takes care of you
customer_reviews.text: They're way brighter then oem the only problem i have is that after about 2 weeks my driver side headlight just flickers pretty bad now. Already ordered from a different brand :/ Edit: i messaged them and they told me i had a 2 year warranty and they would send me a replacement for free. It took about 1 week and i thought they would just send me 1 headlight but to my surprise they sent me both headlights brand new. I would definitely recommend this company!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a year!
customer_reviews.text: My brother and I both bought a set of these for our WRXs and in under a year we both had a bulb burn out. Auxbeam would not honor their warranty because the product was purchased through amazon instead of them directly. Buy another brand. These guys suck.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and work out of the box. Bright enough to read on the road. these units have a built in fan that keeps the LED cool. After the engine is turned off it stays on for about a minute then goes off. That works since we're running around in the garage to get inside.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great for wife fog lights
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my wife’s fog lights on her new escape. She had led running lights but halogen headlights and fog lights so I changed that with Auxbeam!
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Flickering issues
customer_reviews.text: The LEDs were fine when first installed, pretty bright and decently alright to install in my Acura, the massive heatsink made that a bit of a challenge though. Sadly they began to flickering after a few months of ownership, and they dont seem to be as bright anymore which is a shame since Auxbeam is a rather reputable company. Might have to see at getting another pair as I am not sure how long these will last.
customer_reviews.author: Joaris

customer_reviews.title: Good fitment
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect for my 2015 camaro ss bright but looking to get something brighter not bad for price have a different set for another car that seem brighter and is exact model just different bulb size, updating my review because first set started to flicker got the second set and started to flicker not even 2 months later. Not bad for price but gonna end up having to replace them if your daytime running lights are your headlights as well
customer_reviews.author: Jason M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, bright white light, much better than stock halogen
customer_reviews.text: Very bright light. Easy to install. These were installed in fog light assembly. Fans are not loud (quieter than Hikari). Was on fence for awhile about LED lighting, but after getting, LED lighting is the way to go. Note, if you plug in wrong (upside down), flip plug to get lights to work.
customer_reviews.author: RLB64

customer_reviews.title: Fits loosely
customer_reviews.text: They fit loosely! When driving you can see the bulb move slightly. It is not a snug fit.. I even swapped them out from each side to see if it helped. It is still not snug!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Poor light output, distribution and brightness
customer_reviews.text: Very poor light output, distribution and brightness. Yes, I have a projection housing and the stock halogens were brighter. They are bright to look at but have dead spots and don't light up the road at all. *I will edit this with picture to prove*
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: As of today I would recommend these lights to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Just got these headlights and they are very bright. I’ve read some of the reviews where some are saying the lights are not bright but on my Silverado they light up the roadway and signs. I wonder why it took me so long to purchase LED bulbs but I’m never going back. I’ve been flashed but that’s because my truck sits high and there’s no fixing that. As of today I would recommend these lights to anyone. Distance and beam pattern are perfect. If anything changes I will update but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Stan S

customer_reviews.title: Great for older vehicle's without sealed headlight housings.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several of these bulbs. While they are fantastic, they do not work well in newer headlight housings. Most housings are sealed now days, and even though these have a fan, they will overheat quickly when in a sealed headlight.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wygle

customer_reviews.title: Headlights, NO. Fog lights, YES.
customer_reviews.text: I saw good reviews for these lights. So I bought them to replace the original lights in my 2012 Toyota 4Runner. I couldn't see well at all, had to go back to the original halogen bulbs. It was disappointing to see that the original lights were brighter. They are brighter than the fog lights though. I guess the LED's work better as fog lights because they seem to lose considerable amounts of light with distance.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: ... wow is all i can say these lights are super bright crisp and clear i have a huge smile ...
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my 1992 jeep wrangler yj after i did the headlight conversion from a sealed old school light to a composite one wow is all i can say these lights are super bright crisp and clear i have a huge smile on my face everytime i turn on my headlights you see nothing but bright white light that helps you to see everywhere at all times only thing i would suggest is to make sure your lights are adjusted properly because these lights are super bright i am super happy with these lights now looking into a set for my 2016 buick verano
customer_reviews.author: Steve T.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped after 6mos
customer_reviews.text: Great lights until they stopped working 6 mos later. Also have the H1s in my Other car and one of them stopped working as well. Will be returning these under the one year warrantee.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Anderson

customer_reviews.title: These LEDs are it!
customer_reviews.text: From Halogen yellow to a very nice clear white & no hint of blue! I am able to see street signs and road turtles quite clearly with no over brightness but markedly vast improvement over Halogen bulbs. Order delivery was fast. A easy install. Very very happy! Now to order my high beams! Thank you Auxbeam
customer_reviews.author: Carreon

customer_reviews.title: Died within 6 mos.
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. First the fan died on one of them, then eventually the light died altogether. Still under warranty but I feel jumping through hoops of fire suspended over a tank of sharks with freakin lazor beamz on their heads would be easier. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Owen

customer_reviews.title: nice lights
customer_reviews.text: I had to send back one set; the one box was not sealed like the other- they did not work; one noisy fan and the other was dim. Luckily bought a 2nd set and installed that set.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime S.

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with 2014 Mazda3 hatchback
customer_reviews.text: This will not work with a 2014 mazda3 s Grand touring hatchback like Amazon says it will, ended up selling them to a guy so no sweat off my nose
customer_reviews.author: Tom R.

customer_reviews.title: Lights malfunctioning after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my Jeep Renegade fog lights and one turns on and off whenever and the other side flickers. Will see if I could find a brand that lasts longer
customer_reviews.author: dedega39

customer_reviews.title: This set lasted just over 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Update: this were awesome and not my first set of Auxbeam LED headlights, this set actually lasted just over 3 months! One light started flickering yesterday vs my previous set of the same brand which lasted well over a year. Took 2 stars down from 5 due to this set not lasting. Don't get me wrong, this lights give your car a higher end look at night and are bright...
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Low beams are not bright in  a 5 gen 4runner
customer_reviews.text: The product is great.but the low beam is not bright do due to the angle of the 5 gen Toyota 4runner low beam..the low beam are installed side ways verses straight...so it makes a difference the way the led projects out..the high beams and fog lights are great.. bright white...the low beam and fog lights are the same product and part number.. so long story short...the low beams need to b a higher lums..and the dogs and high beams are great.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Velez

customer_reviews.title: 10 pairs never an issue until now!
customer_reviews.text: I really hate to write a bad review of these lights Ive put the same ones in 10 different cars. Never had a issue. I love them! Have the invoices to prove it. But the last pair I bought one of them started flickering and had to be removed. little disappointed there isn't a easy way to contact seller to see if I can exchange just one of them. I don't want to switch to another brand but nervous bout these as they were in a customer car and I don't want to have a bad rep.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: ABout 2 year life span
customer_reviews.text: Great lights and super bright -- ease of install depends on vehicle obviously but if you get the right size it fits well. mine started to flicker just under 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: Great light just wish it lasted longer than 1 1/2 yrs
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights but I expected them to last more than a year and half. One is starting to flicker constantly. Update: I have messages auxbeam and the person answering the message pushed me off to someone else and they haven’t responded so it looks like the two year warranty they should is being ignored, hopefully I’ll get a response soon since the bulb is completely out now.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, super bright
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit leery of these at first, but thought for the price why not give it a shot. I couldn’t be happier with these, they are extremely bright in the white light produced is a major improvement over the stock halogens with the yellow tint. After ordering the first set for my low beams, I went back and ordered two more sets to replace my highbeams and my fog lights. Even though the fan is a bit loud, I can’t hear it with the car running. I don’t think anyone would be disappointed with these
customer_reviews.author: jeremy captain

customer_reviews.title: Lights died in under three months
customer_reviews.text: Lights died already. Very disappointed. I know Auxbeam is a good brand and a quality product I even advertise to my friends for them but this set didn't last me three months so I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: Good beam and color kills radio reception
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs look great. Very good beam in my projector headlights of my base WRX. They cause so much interference with FM radio reception that I can't listen to the radio at all while they are one. I installed 3 ferrite filters on each bulb and it improved but is still too much to allow good radio reception.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall M.

customer_reviews.title: Great light output and perfect fit for a 2015-2018 wrx
customer_reviews.text: Great item, installed with no issues on my 2017 wrx and 2018 wrx for the headlight bulb and fog lights. Love the color and more importantly I can see now at night. Great upgrade for any wrx owner with either the base or premium models. Only had them for a week but so far so good keeping my fingers crossed they last.
customer_reviews.author: Iggy

customer_reviews.title: Strong sellers and good product
customer_reviews.text: Previously left a negative review in which the seller later contacted me and corrected the situation they sent out replacement bulbs. The new bulbs I was sent worked way better than the first pair. They are bright, work very well were plug and play. I put them in my 2014 ford fusion and they are awesome. I appreciate them correcting the situation as fast as they dad.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron M.

customer_reviews.title: These do not last!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not worth buying these. I bought these in 2018, went out in less than a year, I contacted them and the sent me a replacement and they are now going out again in less than a year. They just don’t last. Customer service was great, but I’m not going to just keep replacing them every 8 months. I’m going with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Smith

customer_reviews.title: I can see!
customer_reviews.text: I had one standard headlight go out. My husband suggested these and they are far brighter than standard bulbs. They arrived promptly, and work great! Both headlights have been replaced, and the light is a bright white, as opposed to the yellowish light from standard bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: VoraciousReader

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Bright
customer_reviews.text: Replaces my old halogens with these before i drove to mexico from california. Super aolid bulbs. Light up wayyyyy down the road driving through the desert. And helped me avoid some accidents along the way.
customer_reviews.author: Uli Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a pain to install if your not a tinker
customer_reviews.text: Was not east to get in hax to use a wedge to push in prior to twisting and locking on place. Seems the oring is a bit to thick
customer_reviews.author: Erik T.

customer_reviews.title: Bulb failed after one year, right after warranty (worst life than incandescent)
customer_reviews.text: The good: These bulbs are bright, don't cause (CAN-bus) bulb error message (on Volvo S80), aren't too expensive The bad: don't last as long the OEM incandescent bulb; failed a little after the one year warranty
customer_reviews.author: padlam

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright, easy to install, does not last long
customer_reviews.text: We've had these in our 2014 Santa Fe for a few months. Already out. I've used them in my 06 V70 and they last about a year.
customer_reviews.author: s.deornellas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, don't expect them to last.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these installed for about 6 months and my passenger side is starting to flicker when they first turn on and then randomly throughout my drive. I replaced my halogen bulbs with these in the stock projector, brightness wasn't that impressive and the longevity is laughable. Reading other reviews it seems this is pretty common. But for the price i wasn't expecting them to blow my mind.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well for my 4Runner.
customer_reviews.text: So far it looks great for the price and fits well on the 5gen 4runners. I guess time will tell the Quality.
customer_reviews.author: vasily

customer_reviews.title: Easy cheap way to update your car by ten years!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Super bright. Updates the look and feel of any vehicle! No issues yet. Had them in for a couple months now. The fan is barely noticeable. I don't understand how people complain about the fan noise. Even when I turn the car off and they're still on...I can't hardly hear the fans. They're great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. The light is bright and very easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The light is bright and very easy to install. There is some noise because of the fans but you can't hear it unless it's really quiet inside the car. I'm happy with the purchase and hope it last long. I will probably update the review later on if it fails within a year.
customer_reviews.author: Gixxer83

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headlight. This was the high beam for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headlight. This was the high beam for my car. The only issue is that it was not plug and play. Ford has a special retaining clip for this bulb and I had to make my own to fit the bulb in. The dust cap also had to have some holes punched in it to allow the fan to cool. Minor issues, but some heads up on stuff like that might have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M.

product_meta.title: Auxbeam LED Headlights F-S2 Series H11 LED Headlight Bulb with 2 Pcs of H11 LED Conversion Kits 72W 8000LM Bridgelux COB Chips Fog Light - 1 Year Warranty
feature_bullets: Before purchase Auxbeam H8/H9/H11 led headlights, please check the size of your headlight on your vehicle, if your vehicle requires a set of warning canceller(canbus-driver) to prevent on-dash errors, please purchase one from Auxbeam: ☆☆www.amazon.com/dp/ B01N0LFZ4O☆☆
2 Pcs of H8/H9/H11 single beam led headlight bulbs, each with 3 pcs of high power COB chips. Apply for h11 headlight and fog light
Auxbeam headlight bulbs with Super bright COB chip (USA), 360 degree clear beam no blind zone. Power: 72W/ set (36W/bulb), Luminous Flux: 8000lm (4000lm each bulb), Color Temperature: 6500K
Operating Voltage: DC 9-32V (fit 12V, 24V vehicles). Operating Temperature: -40-80 degree Celsius. Above 30,000 hours life time
Xenon white light reflect road paint/signs better to show clearer road situation. Built-in constant current CPU, instant full brightness without start-up relay

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,057 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
